EmailTemplate.name: DispositionTypeDueDate
EmailTemplate.subject: {!General_Sub_Task__c.Disposition_Type__c} has been assigned to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have been assigned a disposition section of NCR record {!General_Sub_Task__c.Non_Conformance_Number__c}. The Due date of the task is {!General_Sub_Task__c.Due_Date__c}.
Please log in to the Qualityze application and complete the task by the due date.
Please contact {!General_Sub_Task__c.Non_Conformance_Owner__c} if you have any questions about this assignment and/or non-conformance record.
Thank you.
Click here for details
